articleplaceholder-desc:
{{desc|what=extension|name=ArticlePlaceholder|url=https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:ArticlePlaceholder}}
{{WBREPONAME}} is a variable of the repository name of Wikidata (it has replaced the string 'Wikidata').
articleplaceholder-abouttopic-entityid: Text to encourage the user to enter an entity id.
articleplaceholder-abouttopic-no-entity-: Error message in case of an invalid entity id.
articleplaceholder-abouttopic-create-art: Text in the popup encouraging the user to create an article with a selectable title
Label of the article page title input in the 'Create article' popup.
Used as an error message in the 'Create article', if the article title wasn't supplied.
articleplaceholder-abouttopic-article-ex: Error to indicate the given article title already exists
articleplaceholder-search-header: Header in the search for the results of Special:AboutTopic generated pages
